## Self-Review Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project conventions and style
- [ ] No debug statements, console.logs, or commented-out code
- [ ] Functions and variables have clear, descriptive names

### Security

- [ ] No secrets, credentials, or API keys in code
- [ ] No hardcoded passwords or tokens
- [ ] Input validation implemented where applicable
- [ ] Dependencies are from trusted sources only

### Testing

- [ ] Changes tested locally
- [ ] Edge cases considered and handled
- [ ] Existing tests still pass (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] Code is self-documenting or has necessary comments
- [ ] README updated if behavior changed (if applicable)

---

## Security Attestation

> **Required:** Review the Security Sentinel scan results for this PR.

- [ ] Reviewed Security Sentinel scan results
- [ ] Addressed all critical/high severity findings
- [ ] Verified no secrets detected in code
- [ ] Acknowledged any suppressed warnings
